channel.title: Any easy way to get runescape item database on your site?
channel.description: Is there a way to get a runescape item database/monster database and suchs on a site without having to get all information yourself? Im too lazy to make millions myself lol so, I heard people saying its possible to get them from deobs or whatever, I dont get those things lol.

item.title: Any easy way to get runescape item database on your site?
item.dc:creator: @Night26 Night26
item.description:
@Night26 wrote:

lawl fopen the pages and get the items… I did something similar (not rs) for my school db… Collegeboard charges $100 for a list of colleges and their unique college code… So I injected my own post data to steal their list and add it to db lawl… I think they changed the system now though… dunno tho

Read full topic

@sicarius99 wrote:

I personally thinks its pointless to make a new item database with every item just put the essential ones in because thats all that people will be searching that come to your site which isn’t many people because of runehq being up.

item.title: Any easy way to get runescape item database on your site?
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Bang Train, post:17, topic:135130”][quote author=nueb35 link=topic=186573.msg1689242#msg1689242 date=1187688047]
umm all i did was go to silabs website and copyed the list then made an incrissing var wich is the item ID >.> then i put the list in a .txt and made a php script to upload it to mySQL server :\ thats about it :
[/quote]

ya but do they want just a list? or do they want information about each entry?[/quote]
List with the information about the item I need.

Idk about bart

Read full topic

item.source: Any easy way to get runescape item database on your site?

item.title: Any easy way to get runescape item database on your site?
item.dc:creator: @Zero_Freeze ZeroFreeze
item.description:
@Zero_Freeze wrote:

Dump them in a format from a deob (e.g.: Id - name - option 1 etc.).
Then read and parse the dump in a loop and store the values in your database by using jdbc.

Read full topic
